result.purpose: This folder is responsible for unit testing various handler functions related to activities, quests, rewards, and user roles in the Ronin wallet services.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing tests by functionality related to different handlers, ensuring separation of concerns and maintainability.

tests/handlers/activity_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for activity handler functions in the Ronin wallet services.

tests/handlers/helpers_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for the quest state machine transitions in the handlers package.

tests/handlers/participant_quest_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for participant quest handler functionalities.

tests/handlers/quest_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for quest-related handler functions in the application.

tests/handlers/reward_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for reward handling functionalities in the handlers package.

tests/handlers/user_role_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for user role handler functions in the application.
